name: Canal Shoot
description:
Hello friends, 

Me and my friend Carlos produced this game for the stay safe jam on a Sunday.

Idea is to throw supply boxes to people that are in lockdown in their Venetian houses.

Controls

Look at a supply box and press any button on your VR controller to throw it around with your telekinetic powers.  Aim for the balconies! And good luck, your powers seem to be a bit out of control...
